name: Ojou-Sama Pose (Concept LoRA)
description:
Ojou-Sama Pose (Concept LoRA)

Caution:

  • It's still going to be random with the hands.

Made this lora out of curiosity. Samples tested at 1 strength using various models. Trigger word is ojou-sama pose, but you can also use the lora without it and just use hand over own mouth or hand to own mouth or any other hand/finger to face prompts.

Another interesting stuff that I found out is that this lora can somewhat fix fingers but in the end it's just seed rng.

Have fun!
